name: Push Notification Kit
description:
About this file 🚀

  • This is a UI Kit for native push notifications across different platforms such as web, android & ios.
  • This contains both light & dark theme versions of the notifications in native state.


How to use 👨🏻‍💻

  • Duplicate the file
  • Change the heading, subtext, image & logo as per your need
  • You are good to go!


Share feedback ✍🏻

  • Connect with me on LinkedIn | Twitter
  • Follow for stay connected to more upcoming resources.
